sentence.Network_en: One day, it might even suit the Kremlin to encourage this truculence.
sentence.Network_cn: 总有一天可能更适于克里姆宁宫去鼓励这种好战.

sentence.Network_en: Examples of China's truculence as viewed from Washington – abound.
sentence.Network_cn: 在华盛顿方面看来,中国好斗的例子比比皆是.

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile Russia, for all its truculence, has repeatedly delayed supplying the nuclear fuel for Bushehr.
sentence.Network_cn: 与此同时俄罗斯, 基于其好战的习性, 不断推迟供给核原料给布什尔(Bushehr)地区的核反应堆.

list.abs: they strive for security by truculently asserting their own interests ., 他们通过拼命维护自己利益的方式来争取保障.
a truculent speech against the new government ., 反对新政府的挑衅之言.
they strive for security by truculently asserting their own interests ., 他们通过拼命维护自己利益的方式来争取保障.
in a defiantly truculent manner ., 以挑战性的 , 好战的方式.

entry.tran: 暴躁的;易怒的;好斗的;尖刻的
entry.def: If you say that someone is truculent, you mean that they are bad-tempered and aggressive.

auth_sentence.content: The famous morgue and truculence of Wittgenstein, Namier or Popper, expressed their inner confidence of superiority.

auth_sentence.content: The good news is that, despite his famous truculence, he's been forthcoming about the set-list, a real crowd-pleaser.

auth_sentence.content: "The Homecoming" is a summation of the iconoclasm and the truculence that brought Pinter to the peak of his writing career.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+flu流+ence性质,状态→共同流在一起→汇流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠,依赖;信任,信赖;隶属
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend依靠+ence性质,状态→n.依靠,依赖;信任,信赖;隶属
de去掉+spond诺言+ence性质,状态→n.沮丧,悲观
in不+depend依靠+ence性质,状态→n.独立,自主
in无+noc害+ence表名词→n.无害,天真,无罪
insist坚持+ence性质,状态→n.坚持,强求
neg没有+lig选择+ence性质,状态→没有选出→疏忽
revere尊敬,敬畏,崇敬+ence性质,状态→reverence
sil+ence性质,状态→n.静,寂静,沉默,静默
trucul凶猛+ence性质,状态→n.凶猛,粗暴
